::Eclipse/Wolveritron::

    They went to the conference room eager to see =
what was happening.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@...=
m 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 1:06 PM
  S=
ubject: Maximal Meeting


  ::Kluster/Firearm/Rex/Proto/Grimmler/Shredder::=


  Kluster reaches the bridge, sitting down at a console and tapping a 
  =
few buttons. The transmission Zardus had sent a while ago was being 
  play=
ed back on one of the other terminals.

  Kluster frowns, listening to it. =
He tapps a few buttons, bringing up a 
  scan to confirm Zardus' words. The=
re was indeed Predacon activity...

  He gets up. "Allright, the Maximals n=
eed to meet," he says to 
  Shredder, walking out of the bridge with Shredd=
er following him. He 
  activates his comm-link, sending a transmission to =
all Maximals.

  "All Maximals, report to the Cybertronian Fire conference =
room 
  immediately. There are some issues that need to be discussed."

  K=
luster enters the conference room, Shredder motioning for Ramjet to 
  foll=
ow and then entering behind him.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Firearm =
recieves Kluster's transmission as he is walking out of 
  Spears' room.

 =
 "Want to go report to the meeting first? Or should we get this over 
  wit=
h?"
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Rex looks around as he hears Kluster'=
s transmission, looking at 
  Whistler.

  "Kluster wants the Maximals to m=
eet in the conference room. You're a 
  Maximal, right?"
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Proto and Grimmler get out of their CR chambers, setting of=
 for the 
  conference room.



  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h...=
 wrote:
  > Spears::
  > 
  > She nods and wal


        eGroups Sponsor
